Category.name: templatemontecarlo
Category.description: functions and methods for template based MC simulation.

Parameter.name: SimTimes
Parameter.description: vector of time-grid for SDE integration (in year fractions)

Parameter.name: ObsTimes
Parameter.description: vector of time-grid for process observation (in year fractions)

Parameter.name: TimeInterpolation
Parameter.description: allow time-interpolation for payoff evaluation on simulated paths (true or false).

Parameter.name: StoreBrownians
Parameter.description: store Brownian motion increments (true or false).

Member.name: qlRealMCSimulationCalcZCBAdjuster
Member.description: calculate the ZCB adjuster matrix for given simulation.

Parameter.name: ZcbObservTimes
Parameter.description: vector of time-grid for zcb adjuster (in year fractions)

Parameter.name: ZcbOffsetTimes
Parameter.description: vector of time-grid for zcb adjuster (in year fractions)

Member.name: qlRealMCSimulationCalcAssetAdjuster
Member.description: calculate the asset adjuster vector for given simulation.

Parameter.name: AssetObservTimes
Parameter.description: vector of time-grid for asset adjuster (in year fractions)

Parameter.name: PayWeights
Parameter.description: vector of payment weights (usually year fractions).

Parameter.name: Times
Parameter.description: vector of start and payment times.

Parameter.name: PayWeights
Parameter.description: vector of payment weights (usually year fractions).

Parameter.name: FloatTimes
Parameter.description: vector of float leg payment times.

Parameter.name: FloatWeights
Parameter.description: vector of float leg cash flows (usually 1 and -1).

Parameter.name: FixedTimes
Parameter.description: vector of fixed leg payment times.

Parameter.name: FixedWeights
Parameter.description: vector of fixed leg weights (usually year fractions).

Parameter.name: PayTime
Parameter.description: time at which payoff is paid.

Parameter.name: Script
Parameter.description: Payoff script extending the payoff map.

Parameter.name: PayTime
Parameter.description: time at which CashFlow is paid.

Parameter.name: ApplyZCBAdjuster
Parameter.description: Incorporate ZCB adjuster by multiplication with P(T,T).

Parameter.name: EarlyRedemptions
Parameter.description: reference (vector) to early redemptions or strikes.

Parameter.name: RegressionVariables
Parameter.description: reference (vector) to regression var's as CashFlows.

Parameter.name: RegressionFraction
Parameter.description: Fraction of paths used for regression.

Parameter.name: MaxPolynDegree
Parameter.description: maximum degree of monomial for regression.

Member.name: qlRealAMCPricerUnderlyingNPV
Member.description: Return npv of note w/o calls.

Parameter.name: X
Parameter.description: payoffs that are discounted and summed up.

Parameter.name: Y
Parameter.description: other payoffs that are discounted and summed up.

Parameter.name: ObservationTime
Parameter.description: (exercise) time at which maximum is observed.

Parameter.name: Simulation
Parameter.description: reference to MC simulation used for regression.

Parameter.name: MaxPolynDegree
Parameter.description: maximum degree of monomial for regression.

Parameter.name: X
Parameter.description: payoffs that are discounted and summed up.

Parameter.name: Y
Parameter.description: other payoffs that are discounted and summed up.

Parameter.name: ObservationTime
Parameter.description: (exercise) time at which maximum is observed.

Parameter.name: Simulation
Parameter.description: reference to MC simulation used for regression.

Parameter.name: MaxPolynDegree
Parameter.description: maximum degree of monomial for regression.

Member.name: qlRealRegressionMonomials
Member.description: Return monomial values based on explanatory variables.

Member.name: qlRealRegressionValue
Member.description: Return regression value based on explanatory variables.

Parameter.name: SettlementWeights
Parameter.description: vector of weights for each settlement.

Parameter.name: SettlementWeightsA
Parameter.description: vector of weights for each settlement.

Parameter.name: SettlementWeightsB
Parameter.description: vector of weights for each settlement.
